Peoria.Rio Vista Pond:
Rio Vista Pond is located in Rio Vista Park in south central Peoria, Arizona, on Rio Vista Boulevard, just north of Thunderbird Road.


== Fish species ==
Rainbow trout
Largemouth bass
Sunfish
Catfish (channel)
Tilapia
Carp
